title: UAE Emirates Brings Yates, Almeida, McNulty to Vuelta a España in Quest for Grand Tour Sweep
content:
No Pogačar or Ayuso for season dominators, but heavyweight team including a fleet of top climbers and Mexican prodigy Del Toro will line out as favorites.

Read the full article at UAE Emirates Brings Yates, Almeida, McNulty to Vuelta a España in Quest for Grand Tour Sweep on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
